author: Kuro Avuli
comment: It would be great if you could the hourly METAR / SPECI reports. Maybe even the Synoptic reports.   As a surface weather observer,  I would be alot more inclined to use it, if I didn't have to use this, then navigate environment Canada, when it really could just be together.   An easy 5 stars from me if this was done  Always selects wrong location   has proper permissions

author: Sam G.
comment: The app used to be a little more customizable. Now things that I had on the front page take several clicks to get to. Ui is pretty though. Edit: After the update that was supposed to improve navigation I am still disappointed with the navigation. The customizable layout that was previously used was still much more functional then the present layout. The accuracy of the app is still good.

reply.author: The Weather Network / MétéoMédia
reply.content:
Hey Sam! 

We have recently made some changes to the navigation - we made the cards smaller and isolated the key weather features to eliminate the clutter/scrolling. Have you had a change to view the app recently? Please feel free to leave us some feedback if you have a minute!

author: Mary M
comment: Ive been using this app for years and download it with every new phone I get.   Now with the changes, It takes longer to load often so long that I will sometimes close it before it even finishes opening because I've run out of time.    This past week i haven't been able to get it to fully load at all.

author: Shirley Castle
comment: So far it's not 2 bad. It did tell me it was raining outside and temp was 5 but actually it was snowing and temp was -2. Lol I think it's been corrected

author: Patrick Polish
comment: the fact that it has 4 widgets and none of them can provide information other than now, or in 1,2,3 hours....no information for a week forecast, or even the next 48h. just for that keeping installed is a waste of screen real estate

author: Lisa K
comment: I preferred the old format. Not sure why you guys feel the need to keep fixing things that aren't broken. Also I wish you people would realize there's more to Canada than the great lames region. EDIT: it has been about s year and it is still obnoxious.

author: Micah Woloschuk
comment: I would give this app a better rating if it allowed the end user to move it to their sdcard. I believe this used to be an option with earlier versions. This app is fairly large in size & would prefer to have it on my memory card & not forced to my devices internal memory.

author: Geoffrey Mullett
comment: The new app is useless to long to load screens information is all over the place and there's now more adds and fluff than site. I don't care that bobs dog has a leg that tells time and knows when it's going to snow just give me the weather damnit. I'll soon just delete the weather app. Google gives me the weather anyway.

author: Roger Mongrain
comment: 21-02-2018 This app getting worst. Not only it crashes, but now, it freezes my mobile (Samsung Note 3) I can't close the app nor the actual cell phone. This used to be the best but now the WORST. 30-03-17 This the worst version. This app used to be the best... Now crashed while viewing the weather forecast. Still crashes (black screen)  when reading the news section. I've sent many feedback concerning this problem. Is anyone reading these feedbacks and rating? This has been occurring since the latest version of this app. I may have to select a different app in the futur if this problem isn't corrected. The previous version used to work so well. Seems this is going backwards. Let's go into a better futur. Thank you. Revision 5/03/17 Seems your updates isn't correcting the actual problems. I suspect the feedback isn't working also. It doesn't sppear that anyone from Weather Network is reading these feedbacks. No wonder people get angry. I am very patient but there are limits. Please respond or correct the problems. Thank you.

author: Mike Romain
comment: Got latest update.  Format is better but the app still crashes and burns on a regular basis.  (Older comments) Worse than ever! App still crashes out all the time. I even get warnings about this unstable app slowing down my phone due to continuous crashes from malwarebytes. The new format is difficult to use, is very slow loading and doesn't give the details clearly like the old one. Used to be able to see what the day was hourly with precipitation amounts.  It also frequently crashes to a blue screen.

reply.author: The Weather Network / MétéoMédia
reply.content:
Hi Mike, 

We're sorry your experience with the app hasn't been great! We have made it a priority to fix major bugs as we find them within the app. We noticed you are using an older version of the app. If you visit the Google Play Store, you will find an updated version of the app with various new performance improvements!

author: Dan Cote
comment: Open app, grey screen, says input city, city  not found. Location is on. Searched major city (ie Toronto) city not found..  app does not work.  Junk

author: Stephen Cuthbertson
comment: Overall great, gives awesome and up-to-date push notifications for severe weather. Only downside is most of the time I try to use the radar it loads one time slot and then the rest of the radar forecast is blank.

author: Carla Freeman
comment: Wondering if there is an actual human actually looking at the radar because you are terrible at predicting the weather. Lol

author: Greg m
comment: This app has gone down hill. slow loading, disorganized. Too many news articles about nothing.

author: Mikan Taisho
comment: The update made it less convinient to get to the information. We used to be able to get everything we wanted in one page.

author: ger ber
comment: Was good until recent update turned it into a giant billboard of ads. Before  was one small ad at the bottom. Now it has several half screen sized ads.

author: Spurgeon Mclean
comment: Weather almost every screen conflicts with the previous. At best it gives us something to talk about.

author: Michael Hamilton-Jones
comment: The content and look of the app is really nice, but it takes far too long to load. Almost 10 seconds every time you open it.

author: Joe Bartolotta
comment: Follow me does not work right very slow to load
PLEASE BRING BACK THE OLD APP.  This new App is terrible.

author: hate goog
comment: Ads make it suck. You ruin the whole weather service you are trying to provide by putting ads in your app.  Greed is unappealing. Will uninstall.

author: Marianne Naumchuk
comment: For the last 3 months this app does not allow me to see the weather.  I get the notifications at the top of my phone but as for "weather when you need it" it provides nothing but "this app has stopped working.  Would you like to report"

author: Nicole Kearney
comment: Unable to search for my city, just shows me a grey screen that won't go away.

author: James Kempf
comment: It is stupidly slow to load information.

author: Quinton Paivio
comment: U get paid too much to be wrong 60 % of the time !
Useless app that never loads the weather forecast!!
Too slow, too much advertisement.

author: Matt Planche
comment: SLOW AF!!! Lags. Sometimes doesn't load or refresh

author: James Troughton
comment: Most Informative. Never miss a day's weather report. Thanks!

author: Gren-Erich Zwicker
comment: Sometimes I can't even get past ads

author: Christopher Barfoot
comment: Freezing many timea upon opening.

author: Hua Jun Deng
comment: too many advertisement is annoying on the screen

author: Jeff B
comment: The update screwed it up. Hardcore.

author: Brett Morris
comment: Best app on the market. Weather is always right.

author: Chris Eberhardt
comment: The widget doesn't update sometimes The app is still pretty good, though.

author: Steve Ke
comment: it takes Samsung S8 5 seconds to start this app, why is so slow after new updated??

author: Brian Hoffmann
comment: I think this app is very useful. I use it everyday to see what it's like outside before I step out the door

author: reza elmii
comment: Giving the compele info for long period, doesn't need to click 2 times,
I get all the info I need when I go into this app

author: Group One
comment: Good, but takes a lot of and bandwidth.
